Paragraph: The resulting PBDT-TDPP-S showed good solubility in common organic solvents , such as chlorobenzene , o-dichlorobenzene , and dichloromethane ( DCM ) , but PBDT - DPP was nearly not soluble in them.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| chlorobenzene |
| o-dichlorobenzene |
| dichloromethane (DCM) |
| PBDT - DPP |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After removing the entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name", we have:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| chlorobenzene |
| o-dichlorobenzene |
| dichloromethane (DCM) |
